hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Regime Analysis Catalyst Spillover
hypothesis_content.statement: Publication of 'smarter' Dogecoin regime analysis (scenarios/signals) will act as a catalyst that amplifies trading activity in the top 5 meme coins (DOGE, SHIB, WIF, PEPE, BONK), increasing their aggregate 6hr volume-to-market-cap ratio by ≥40% within 6 hours, leading to mean reversion plays in relative strength.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Analytical content on meme coins legitimizes the sector for short-term traders, increasing uniform attention and volume. This creates temporary momentum distortions between peers, offering mean reversion opportunities as flows stabilize.
entry_conditions: News spike for 'Dogecoin analysis' or 'meme coin regime' (volume > 5x 7d avg)
Aggregate meme coin 6hr volume/mcap ratio increases by 25% from prior 6hr period
Identify strongest meme coin (highest 2hr RSI) and weakest (lowest 2hr RSI) in basket
Enter pairs trade: short strongest / long weakest when RSI spread > 25 points

exit_conditions.take_profit: RSI spread converges to < 10 points OR 3% profit on paired trade

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coin aggregate volume/mcap ratio fails to increase ≥40% following targeted analytical content publication, or RSI spreads do not converge after widening on the volume spike.
